SEARCH
Package Engine

Class EntityHandler

java.lang.Object
Engine.EntityHandler
public class EntityHandler extends Object
The EntityHandler class manages entities, their components, and their interactions. It provides functionality to add, remove, and update entities, as well as handling their components.
Author:
haotian

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected class 
    EntityHandler.ComponentMap
    The ComponentMap class represents a map of components in the EntityHandler class.

      Registers a component with the given ID and class.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the component.
      c - The class of the component.
      method - The method to register.

    • parseData

      protected void parseData(EntityHandler.ComponentMap map)
      Parses the data in the given ComponentMap and updates the corresponding entities. If an entity does not exist, the data is stored in a delayedData map for future processing.
      Parameters:
      map - The ComponentMap containing the data to be parsed.

    • parseDataFor

      public void parseDataFor(Entity entity, HashMap<Byte,Serializable> comp)
      Parses data for a specific entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to update.
      comp - The component data to parse.

      Parameters:

      id - The ID of the component.
      value - The value to set.
